Text:
This is one of the best documentaries I've ever seen (and I watch a lot of documentaries). This should be required viewing.

The video quality and sound are as close to perfect as one could get.

Thanks so much for the upload TvTeam!


A = 10
V = 10

Overall rating = 100,000+

This is an amazing movie. Parts of it turned my stomach and had me ready to pack my bags for Canada while others had me preparing to go after Karl Rove. Thanks very much for the upload, great movie. Agree with spyrule that this movie should be required viewing.
